statements.expression:
Transform(
	TrfQuizWithTopic,    
	RdsSelectReader(
    	QuizzesDatabase.Quiz, 
        [
        	RdsConditional(
            	quizId == ^args.quizId, 
                !IsNull(^args.quizId)
            ), 
            RdsConditional(
            	topicId == ^args.topicId, 
                !IsNull(^args.topicId)
            ),
            RdsConditional( 
            	RdsLike( topic.name, "%" + ^args.topicName + "%" ),
                !IsNull( ^args.topicName )
            ),
            RdsConditional( 
            	RdsLike( question, "%" + ^args.question + "%" ),
                !IsNull( ^args.question )
            ),
            RdsConditional(
            	RdsLike( answer1, "%" + ^args.answer + "%" ) ||
                RdsLike( answer2, "%" + ^args.answer + "%" ) ||
                RdsLike( answer3, "%" + ^args.answer + "%" ) ||
                RdsLike( answer4, "%" + ^args.answer + "%" ),
                !IsNull( ^args.answer )
            )
         ], 
         RdsDesc( quizId ), 
         ^args.offset, 
         ^args.limit
    )
)

parameters.name: offset
parameters.remarks: Requested index for start the results to be provided in response.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.remarks: Requested number results to be provided in response.

routing.remarks: Allows to get a list of Quizzes.
